page.title: 151st Holy Communion
page.content: On the day the{first year juniors} made their{first Holy Communion}we were above them in the choir loft of{ {St. Clare's Church.}There were lots of people. The boys and girls who were making their communion looked very nice. Fr. Barry{celebrated}the{Mass.} Mrs Graham played the{organ}and everyone said afterwards how good the{ {singing}was. We all got a lift back to school. To celebrate, we had a{ {breakfast}of cakes and crisps and all sorts. I had a very good time. Inside the church there were cobwebs hanging from the ceiling. The{windows} are very{colourful.}When you are at the back of the church you can't hear very well. There are beautiful{statues in the church and beautiful pictures too. St. Clare's Church is our{parish {church. }
